title: It’s Happening, And Soros And The Libs Aren’t Happy (Ep 1635)
description:
The left is furious, and George Soros and the cat lady are leading the effort to strike back. In this episode, I address their latest plot. We also address Florida’s resurgence and a parent who refuses to be held captive by school board tyranny. 

News Picks:


George Soros is back!


We are running record deficits, despite record tax revenue. 


Inflation is exploding.

Are vaccine mandates threatening our national security?


Anti-cancel culture platforms combine to expand the free speech economy.


Did the Biden administration vet the refugees from Afghanistan?


The Biden administration ignored the malaise and focuses on a “national gender strategy.”
